name: No Way Out (itch) (cheesybite)
description:
No Way Out

You find yourself alone in a room of some sort, you don't know why you're there, but all you know is that you have to survive as monsters keep coming after you.

You seem to have a strange ability that allows you to survive longer than you expected, but still there's No Way Out.

Controls

"WASD/Arrows" to move

"R" to restart 

"Space bar" to use ability
